title: M9: MT, Metalinguistic Awareness and Bias
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: advanced. * SUPERVISION: teacher-guided. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 30 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: English, French * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: Another source language that has grammatical gender could be used instead of French. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: If your language pair does not include a language with grammatical gender, use the French-English example presented in this activity, but allow extra time to explain the idea of grammatical gender.
